title: Bob's Curse
description: All of Isaac's bombs now leave a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius
As well as dealing the standard 60 damage for a bomb, it will apply a Damage over Time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick
Has a chance to drop from the Super Sloth miniboss fight
Counts as 1 of 3 poison items needed towards the Bob transformation
REPENTANCE - Bob's Curse bombs now leave behind a gas cloud that poisons enemies that move through it.
